channel.title: Software Spending Concerns on FinanClub

item.title: ZI
item.description: score:42 Chances: ZoomInfo Technologies Inc. has announced partnerships and events to expand its digital media capabilities, indicating growth potential. Despite recent weakness in ZI stock, its financial prospects are considered decent by some analysts, suggesting a possible turnaround. ZoomInfo earned numerous #1 Grid rankings and leader ratings in G2’s Summer 2023 report, reflecting its strong industry position.
